Career Profile

DevOps Engineer with over a year of hands-on experience in optimizing infrastructure and deployment pipelines. Possesses strong problem-solving skills and is highly adaptable in team environments. Holds a strong foundation in the IT sector, having been involved in large-scale IT and physical security projects. With core skills in Linux administration, shell scripting, Jenkins, Terraform, Kubernetes, and AWS, adept at streamlining deployment processes, automating workflows, and implementing scalable and secure infrastructure solutions. Holds a Master of Science in Systems Network and Security, dedicated to helping organizations improve their infrastructure by focusing on reliability, speed, and security. Passionate about leveraging technology for organizational success, committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in DevOps and cloud computing.

Experiences

Devops Engineer

Schoox Inc, Thessaloniki, Greece

In my current role as a DevOps Engineer, I am responsible for optimizing infrastructure and deployment pipelines to ensure seamless software delivery and operational efficiency. Leveraging my expertise in Linux administration, shell scripting, Jenkins, Terraform, Kubernetes, and AWS, I design and implement automated processes to streamline development workflows and enhance system reliability. I collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to identify areas for improvement and implement scalable solutions that align with business objectives. Additionally, I am involved in monitoring and maintaining cloud infrastructure, ensuring high availability and security. My strong problem-solving skills and adaptability enable me to effectively troubleshoot issues and implement innovative solutions to complex technical challenges. I am passionate about continuous improvement and stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in DevOps and cloud computing to drive organizational success.
